name: plan_name
description: Subscription plan name (e.g., FREE, STARTER, PROFESSIONAL, ENTERPRISE)

name: status
description: Subscription status: ACTIVE, TRIAL, SUSPENDED, EXPIRED, CANCELLED

name: daily_limit
description: Maximum pipeline runs allowed per day

name: monthly_limit
description: Maximum pipeline runs allowed per month

name: seat_limit
description: Maximum team members allowed for this subscription

name: providers_limit
description: Maximum provider integrations allowed for this subscription

name: trial_end_date
description: Date when trial period ends (NULL if not on trial)

name: subscription_end_date
description: Date when subscription ends (NULL for ongoing)
